Key Match Events: Julian Alvarez's second-half goal gave Argentina an early lift
Lautaro Martinez sealed the outcome in the 89th minute with an assist from Messi
Maxime Crepeau made several highlight-reel saves for Canada
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was cautious in the first half due to Canada's speed in transition
Canada head coach Jesse Marsch predicted that Argentina would come out with a new plan after halftime
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina's Lionel Scaloni criticized the temporary playing surface at Mercedes-Benz Stadium
Canada head coach Jesse Marsch praised Maxime Crepeau's performance and noted that his team had several good chances to score
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a temporary playing surface at Mercedes-Benz Stadium
The crowd chanted goalkeeper Dibu Martinez's name after he made a save
Argentina's halftime delay was seen as a tactic by the team
Others: Argentina fell behind in the Copa America for the first time since 2019
Canada's Jonathan David and Cyle Larin had several good chances to score but were unable to finish
